A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: As a lifelong fan I was shocked at Johnson’s poor handling of the material and the direction he took with the Characters\, especially Luke. For the first time ever I have seen a Star Wars movie that I can honestly say I didn’t like. The movie lacked familiarity to the Star Wars Universe we all know and love. Luke calls a lightsaber a laser sword\, seriously??? Let’s just hope the next movie is able to recover from this disaster.
